profile:
We provide full-service Residential and Commercial Renovators and Remodeling Services to help you improve your home or business. 
 
We are FULLY INSURED with WSIB company with few years of experience with a team of professional members in each and every aspect. 
 
At Reno For Less, we've built our livelihoods on remodeling people's homes from the simple to 
 
the lavish, we've experienced it all and we can help you every step of the way. 

NO JOB IS TOO SMALL OR TOO BIG for our knowledgeable crews. We've happily done it for all of our clients.


@ Basement Finishing & Remodeling: 

Whatever you dream let Reno for Less take full design control to create a brand new basement space. 
Once complete, you can sit back, relax and be thankful you left it in the hands of a professional. 
we do it for you from the design then Permit and then all the way to give the key of your dream new space to enjoy it   .


@ Flooring : 
We professionally install all the following:
- Hardwood 
- Laminate 
- Engineered Hardwood 
- Vinyl tile 
- Porcelain tile 
- Ceramic tile 
- Baseboard and Trim 


@ Convert CARPET stairs to SOLID WOOD staircase: 
- Staining and change the color of the existing solid wood stairs. 
- Change carpet steps to a solid wood steps . 
- Switch wood spindles (pickets ) to iron. 
- All railing work 

@ Interlocking and Landscaping : 
- Interlock 
- Natural Stone 
- Retaining Walls 
- Steps 
- Deck 
- Landscape Design. 
- interlock sealing ( power wash , polymeric sand application, Sealing will give the shine wet look of your beautiful interlock ) . 
- Interlock Repair and re-level the uneven or sunk areas 

@ Full Kitchen and Bath Renovation: 
- Build a new bath 3 or 4 pieces (Toilet , sink , shower and bathtub) from scratch or flip the existing one, ( all Plumbing work will be done by a fully insured ,license and experienced plumbers crew . )
- Backsplash 
- Floor tiles 
- Counter tops 

@ Commercial Services: 
- Office renovations and remodelling 
- Dental offices - Medical offices 
- Restaurants 
- Retail stores 
- Leasehold improvements 
- Industrial spaces 


@ Painting 
- Residential panting
- Wallpaper
- Industrial Painting, 
- Epoxy Floor Coating 
- Commercial Spray Painting Service for Manufacturing Plants
- Industrial Factories & Warehouses

Plumbing Services
@ We providing all the plumbing services , it is all done by a fully insured ,license and experienced plumbers crew . 

Electrical Services 
@ Adding  > new spot lights, new receptacle outlets, new switches and much more … ALL DONE by a license electrician with many wears of experience 

www.reno-for-less.ca

profile:
B&B Design is a family owned company originated from 2011. We offer residential and commercial renovations such as kitchen, bathroom, basements, office and many more home additions. We provide exceptional customer service with honest rates and high quality craftsmanship. Our goal is to make your dreams into reality!

Contact Bold & Beautiful Design
416-434-1638
services:
Basement Renovations
B&B design offers many options to customers in order to ensure that the job is done to code. We recommend inspections for plumbing and electrical work, as well as city permits. B&b is committed to making the customers dream a reality by educating and being realistic about the work they want done.

Bathroom Renovations
Bathroom designs come in many shapes and forms. The most important step b&b recommends about renovating bathrooms is to ensure that the room is mold and water proofed. B&B highly recommends schluter products for all of these needs.

Kitchen Renovations
B&b provides engineers and design consultants to help bring a customers thought into reality. B&b takes pride in properly utilizating all of the space available. B&b provides an array of designs and countertops for competitive pricing to make sure each customer get something beautiful and unique.
warranty_terms: Our company provides one year free of charge for defects of work & materials for all of our installations.

profile:
Mrbasements will inspect your basement, work directly with your design and schedule and build your dream basement within your budget. Using progressive 3D renderings showing you what your basement will look like even before the first baseboard is installed, you have the power to choose exactly what you want (and don’t want) installed.

All our staff are well trained and certified so you can feel assured you’re getting the best service possible.
